https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hVEizR2CZvSV6h7RjOH0JIROCV7.jpg The film deals with an Indian American student who wanted to pursue his love of music over the more 'typical' academic endeavors of Indian Americans (e.g., medicine, engineering, law, and business). American Chai
